name: NapoleonHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on stylus”
”Alexa, turn off stylus”
”Alexa, set temperature on stylus to 25”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Napoleon Home skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your Napoleon Home compatible devices by voice as we enhance your everyday living. 

To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa app to link your Napoleon Home account and discover your device(s). 

Before using this skill, you will need to know the name of the device you want to control. You can rename them in two ways:
-Use the name of the device you set up already in the Napoleon Home app which can be modified through the device settings. 
-Use the name of the device you set up already in the Alexa app which can be modified through the device settings in the Alexa app.
